com.mapmyfitness.android.mmfremoteappexample.app.com.mapmyfitness.android.mmfremote
Class RemoteCommunication

java.lang.Object
  com.mapmyfitness.android.mmfremoteappexample.app.com.mapmyfitness.android.mmfremote.RemoteCommunication

public class RemoteCommunication
extends java.lang.Object

This class takes care of all the communication between the MMF apps and this SDK. It uses string and int constants to bind and pass information to the RemoteControllerService in the MMF apps.

Field Summary

protected  void cancelWorkoutStartCommand()
          Tell the RemoteControllerService in MMF apps to cancel a start that it had on hold because of the lack of GPS.
